Reference

Exported Functions

Functions exported by recruitR

cfbd_recruiting_position()

Get college football position group recruiting information.

cfbd_recruiting_player()

Get player recruiting rankings

cfbd_recruiting_team()

Get college football recruiting team rankings information.

cfbd_venues()

CFBD Venues Endpoint Overview

cfbd_team_talent()

Get composite team talent rankings for all teams in a given year

cfbd_team_roster()

Get team rosters

cfb_conf_types_df

College Football Conference

tfs_recruiting_rankings()

Get 247 CFB Player Recruiting Rankings

tfs_recruitment()

Get 247 Recruitment

Internals

Internal functions and helpers

cfbd_key() has_cfbd_key()

CFBD API Key Registration

college_states()

Adds college state information

bordering_states()

Determines whether the recruit was an in-state recruit, from a bordering state, or from out of the region for the college
